body_html:
I don't think there is an existing HS implementation in TensorFlow. Contributions are welcome!

FYI here is the first result from a google search for [hierarchical softmax tensorflow]

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44140486/scalable-efficient-hierarchical-softmax-in-tensorflow

body:
I don't think there is an existing HS implementation in TensorFlow.  Contributions are welcome!

FYI here is the first result from a google search for [[hierarchical softmax tensorflow]](https://www.google.com/search?q=hierarchical+softmax+tensorflow)

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44140486/scalable-efficient-hierarchical-softmax-in-tensorflow
